base_description: Gray, rectangular drawer unit with three drawers.
part_description: Three equal-sized drawers stacked vertically with curved handles, enclosed in a rectangular frame.
internal_interaction_description: Each drawer slides in and out smoothly within the frame, supported by internal tracks. The handles are attached centrally on each drawer front, allowing easy grip and pull functionality.
external_interaction_description: The drawer unit can be placed on a flat surface, interacting with users who open and close drawers to store or retrieve items. It can be positioned alongside other furniture for organizational purposes.
